original_title: ความหวังแช่แข็ง: ขอเกิดอีกครั้ง
overview: A Buddhist scientist from Bangkok decides to cryo-preserve his daughter's brain. As scandal swirls around the family, they struggle to grieve a child that, in their view, is suspended between death and a future reawakening.
tagline: How far would you go to give your child a second chance at life?
title: Hope Frozen: A Quest To Live Twice
